entry.title: WIND WARNING , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 then increasing to 60 gusting to 90 near noon. High 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
